newsitem.title: USA: Oneita not in compliance with covenants.
newsitem.headline: Oneita not in compliance with covenants.

text.p: Oneita Industries Inc said Friday it was not in compliance with certain financial covenants arising under its credit agreements.
The company said the lending banks under its revolving credit agreement had assigned their interest to third parties.

It said it was going to begin talks with those parties and its remaining institutional lender "through which it hopes to secure waivers covering the periods of non-compliance and to restructure its existing debt commitments".
The company said loan balances outstanding under the credit agreements totalled $63.2 million as of December 28.
Oneita reported a loss of $0.65 a share for the first quarter ended December 28 against a loss of $0.49 a year ago and forecast an operating loss for the second quarter.
